content.heading: HTML Description Lists
paragraphs: A description list is a list of terms, with a description of each term.
The <dl> tag defines the description list, the <dt> tag defines the term (name), and the <dd> tag describes each term.

content.heading: Example
paragraphs:
<dl> 
<dt>Coffee</dt> 
<dd>- black hot drink</dd>
 <dt>Milk</dt> 
<dd>- white cold drink</dd> 
</dl>

content.heading: Chapter Summary
paragraphs: Use the HTML <dl> element to define a description list
Use the HTML <dt> element to define the description term
Use the HTML <dd> element to describe the term in a description list
